fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Send a monster out to another player's home
- For 5 Malice, Free a Titan. This has no immediate effect.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sending a monster to a player's home will either Kill them, roleblock them, or reveal their role to you. There is a 33% chance of each and you cannot receive the same effect twice in a row.
- Once 5 Titans are freed, They will flood the town with evil, causing a Malice Overflow.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- You may now pick which effect occurs.
- You may now make a deal with one other player for their soulmate. They will reenter the game with an allied role as their lover.
- If overflow was achieved via the Titans, then the town has 3 days to find and lynch a Dark Magic member, otherwise, the Dark Magic will win.
